member.summary: Inserts a new record into the text file database.
member.param: The record to insert into the database.

member.name: M:CoffeeMachineSystem.DataAccess.TextFileDatabase.Read
member.summary: Reads all records from the text file database.
member.returns: A list containing all records read from the database.

member.name: M:CoffeeMachineSystem.DataAccess.TextFileDatabase.ReadFieldById(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Char)
member.summary: Reads the specified field of a record from the text file database based on the specified ID.
member.param: The ID of the record to read.
The index of the field to read within the record.
The character used to separate fields in the records.
member.returns: The value of the specified field.

member.name: M:CoffeeMachineSystem.DataAccess.TextFileDatabase.Delete(System.Int32,System.Char)
member.summary: Deletes a record from the text file database based on the specified ID.
member.param: The ID of the record to delete.
The character used to separate fields in the records.

member.name: M:CoffeeMachineSystem.DataAccess.TextFileDatabase.UpdateField(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Char)
member.summary: Updates a specific field of a record in the text file database based on the specified ID and field index.
member.param: The ID of the record to update.
The index of the field to update within the record.
The new value to set for the field.
The character used to separate fields in the records.

member.summary: Writes all records to the text file database.
